page.title: 01RESUME OF BLOCK 04920225
page.content: To the west of the area is a high density population but incorporating established council housing, high class housing, smaller private properties and new development housing. The far south west corner of the area includes a small part of central Leighton Buzzard with its car park, commerce, fire station, council offices and other public services. Over half the area spans the established countryside between Leighton Buzzard and the surrounding villages of Hockliffe, Eggington and Heath and Reach. Much of this area is farmland producing varied crops and livestock. The area also includes a number of sand quarries, an important local industry, which employs the sand in tile making.
